name: Moon Phase
description: Moon phase calculator with Hindu lunar calendar (Tithi) integration

icons.src: data:image/svg+xml,<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 100 100'><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' fill='%23f5f5f5'/><circle cx='50' cy='50' r='45' fill='url(%23craters)'/><defs><pattern id='craters' x='0' y='0' width='100' height='100' patternUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><circle cx='30' cy='40' r='3' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'/><circle cx='70' cy='30' r='5' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.08)'/><circle cx='20' cy='70' r='4' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'/><circle cx='80' cy='60' r='6' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.07)'/><circle cx='50' cy='80' r='3.5' fill='rgba(0,0,0,0.09)'/></pattern></defs></svg>
